com.ephesoft.dcma.tesseract

Class TesseractReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.tesseract.TesseractReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICommonConstants

    @Component
public class TesseractReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICommonConstants
    This class reads the image files from batch xml, generates HOCR file for each one of them and writes the name of each HOCR file in build.xml.It uses Tesseract plugin for generating HOCR files which can accept images in three languages : english, french and spanish.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    ICommonConstants, BatchSchemaService

      void cleanUpIntrmediatePngs(java.lang.String folderName)
